overview: Featuring cover girls Jana Cova, Teagan Presley and Bella Donna, UNDRESSED and OVERSEXED is destined to be an instant classic! These three ladies appear together in a sizzling-hot lesbian threesome. Although that scene was indeed a steamy one, the Lauren Phoenix, Mick Blue and Tristan threesome also stands out. Also starring Shy Love, Sophia and Lanny Barby, UNDRESSED and OVERSEXED has been garnering critical praise.
title: Undressed and Oversexed
